titles: Amorous orontus, or, The love in fashion
author: Corneille, Thomas, 1625-1709.
Bulteel, John, fl. 1683.
publisher: Printed by G.M. for J. Playfere,
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Attributed to Thomas Corneille. cf. NUC pre-1956.
A translation by John Bulteel of Corneille's "L'amour à la mode". Originally published in 1665 under title: Amorous Orontus.
